keyEvents.title: Hody Defeats Vander Decken
keyEvents.description: The battle between Hody and Vander Decken concludes at Gyoncorde Plaza with Hody's victory.
keyEvents.significance: Major turning point in the Fish-Man Island Arc conflict.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Hody Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: The main confrontation between Luffy and Hody Jones begins in the waters around Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic battle of the arc starts at this location.

keyEvents.title: Hyouzou's Energy Steroid Overdose
keyEvents.description: Hyouzou transforms after consuming too many Energy Steroids at the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Raises the threat level dramatically at the battle site.

keyEvents.title: Wadatsumi vs Surume
keyEvents.description: Wadatsumi defeats Surume at the plaza after taking an Energy Steroid.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the effectiveness of Energy Steroids in combat.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Enhanced Hyouzou Setup
keyEvents.description: Zoro prepares to face the steroid-enhanced Hyouzou after protecting Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up a major swordsman battle at the plaza.

description: A large plaza at the center of Fish-Man Island within the Ryugu Kingdom. The main battleground for the conflict between the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies against the New Fish-Man Pirates.
culturalSignificance: Central gathering place of Fish-Man Island; name is a pun on the Japanese word for fish (魚, gyo) and the Concorde Plaza in Paris.
notes: Primary battle location for the Fish-Man Island Arc's climax.
